form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT IN LIEU OF LOST RECEIPT OF UNITED STATES IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FOR COLLATERAL ACCEPTED AS SECURITY, FOM 8/8

full_text: AFFIDAVIT IN LIEU OF LOST RECEIPT OF UNITED STATES IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FOR COLLATERAL ACCEPTED AS SECURITY IF KNOWN: Bonded Alien A Number FOIA (b)(6) A34 038 282T, 283, State of California ) Date and Place of Birth ) SS Mexico County of Los Angeles ) Receipt Number (From Form I-305) LOS 7421 Romualdo QUINTANA-DIAZ I, , being duly sworn, depose and say: That I reside at 1126 South Kern Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90022 ; (Number) (Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) That I am the surety on an immigration bond executed in behalf of FOIA (b)(6) Juan, Baltazar, & QUINTANA at Los Angeles, CA , on 08-29-72 ; That as collateral security under such bond I deposited with the Immigration and Naturalization Service certain securities as follows: $4,500.00-- Treasury Bonds : That the receipt which was issued to me on the same day by the Immigration and Naturalization Service for such collateral security has been lost under the following circumstances: Misplaced That if the said receipt is located. I promise to see that it is surrendered to the Immigration and Natura- lization Service; That there are no other claimants to the said collateral security and I have not assigned the same or any part there of or any interest therein to any other party; That I, on behalf of myself, my heirs, administrators, executors or assigns, will protect the Government of the United States and any of its agencies, officers and employees and save them harmless from any claim, loss or liability whatsoever which may or might arise by reason of the surrender to me of the said collateral security without my producing the receipt issued therefor. Signature at Subscribed and sworn to before Eth me on Juhs <14 1983 OFFICIAL SEAL Notary Public PATRICIA ANN HILL NOTARY PUBLIC-CALIFORNIA My commission expires 4.23.86 LOS ANGELES COUNTY My Commission Expires April 23, 1986 UNITED STATES DE PARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service From I-395 (Rev. 9-5-78)N
